name: Dr. Elena Müller
title: Professor of Computer Science
bio: Dr. Müller has over 15 years of experience in software engineering and artificial intelligence. She holds a PhD from MIT and has published over 50 research papers.

name: Prof. James Wilson
title: Dean of Business School
bio: Professor Wilson brings 20 years of industry experience from Fortune 500 companies. He specializes in strategic management and international business.
education: PhD Business Administration, Harvard Business School

name: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra
title: Professor of International Relations
bio: Dr. Al-Zahra is an expert in Middle Eastern politics and international diplomacy. She has served as an advisor to several international organizations.
education: MA Political Science, American University of Beirut

name: Dr. Michael Thompson
title: Professor of Data Science
bio: Dr. Thompson is a leading researcher in big data analytics and statistical modeling. He has worked with major tech companies and government agencies.
education: PhD Statistics, University of California Berkeley
